Profiles Models

class profiles.models.Profile(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Django model that represents a user profile.

Each user profile is linked to a single Django User instance. A user profile has a ‘favorite_city’ attribute which is a string that can be left blank.

Attributes:

user (OneToOneField): A one-to-one relationship with the User model. On user deletion, the profile is also deleted. favorite_city (CharField): A character field that stores the user’s favorite city. Can be left blank.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
